title: I cannot pair my phone with other Bluetooth devices. Why?
answer:
Your phone supports various profiles, such as A2DP, HSP, HFP, PAN, HID, OPP, and PBAP. If the pairing device also supports these profiles but fails to be paired with, see the following solutions: 

 Your phone cannot find other phones. 

 Solution: Check that Bluetooth on the other phone is turned on and the phone is set to be visible. 

 Your phone cannot find a Bluetooth headset. 

 Solution: Check that the headset is set to be visible. For details about how to configure the headset, see the user guide of the headset. 

 Your phone cannot send files to other phones. 

 Solution: Check that the phone to be connected to can receive files and support the format of the file to be sent.
